criteria: 80% unit test coverage for new models; All security rules peer-reviewed; Flake8 and Black compliance.
success_metrics: Zero new critical code quality issues reported.

criteria: End-to-end test for trip creation and assignment passes; All validation rules (capacity, license) are covered by integration tests.
success_metrics: Core trip workflow is functional without critical bugs.

criteria: Driver Portal MVP passes manual testing on target iOS and Android devices; All UI meets responsiveness requirements (360px+); Security tests for driver data segregation pass.
success_metrics: Driver workflow is intuitive and bug-free on mobile.

criteria: End-to-end e-invoicing flow passes against GSP sandbox; PDF invoice format is confirmed to be compliant; Payment recording correctly updates customer ledger.
tools_used: Pytest, Mock GSP Server, Odoo Test Framework
success_metrics: System can generate a legally compliant invoice and track payment.

criteria: GPS data ingestion pipeline meets <10s end-to-end latency requirement; Map view UI maintains responsiveness with 100+ active vehicles.
success_metrics: Real-time tracking meets NFRs without degrading system stability.

criteria: Data migration dry-run validation report shows <0.1% errors and 100% financial reconciliation; All user roles have completed training; All high-priority bugs are resolved.
tools_used: Migration Validation Scripts, UAT Test Suite
